verses.name: Acts 17:12
verses.text: Therefore many of them believed; also of honourable women which were Greeks, and of men, not a few.

verses.name: Acts 17:13
verses.text: But when the Jews of Thessalonica had knowledge that the word of God was preached of Paul at Berea, they came thither also, and stirred up the people.

verses.name: Acts 17:14
verses.text: And then immediately the brethren sent away Paul to go as it were to the sea: but Silas and Timotheus abode there still.

verses.name: Acts 17:15
verses.text: And they that conducted Paul brought him unto Athens: and receiving a commandment unto Silas and Timotheus for to come to him with all speed, they departed.
